resources.string: Are you sure about restarting this level?\nThis will remove all your moves until now and can\'t be undone!
Don\'t get too excited though, you are still on the lower levels.\nLets see if you can finish the next one.
These levels are easy.\nLets see if you can finish the next one.
If you ask me, I think you took too long for such a easy level.\nLets see if you can complete the next one faster.
